section.title: Intro
section.p: The lookup tool is shortly described at the lookup documentation page at. Here is some info on lookup that is relevant to the present project.

section.title: Flags
section.p: The mb flag tells that lookup accepts multicharacter input both in the upper and lower language, which is crucial since we use UTF-8. The TT flag tells that there is no separator between the lexeme and the tags to follow it.
